point.description: The slope of the reduction in the maximum allowed watts output as a function of frequency.
point.label: WGra

point.description: The frequency deviation from nominal frequency (ECPNomHz) at which a snapshot of the instantaneous power output is taken to act as the CAPPED power level (PM) and above which reduction in power output occurs.
point.label: HzStr

point.description: The frequency deviation from nominal frequency (ECPNomHz) at which curtailed power output may return to normal and the cap on the power level value is removed.
point.label: HzStop

point.description: The maximum time-based rate of change at which power output returns to normal after having been capped by an over frequency event.
point.label: HzStopWGra

point.description: Scale factor for increment and decrement ramps.
point.label: RmpIncDec_SF
